item.description:
***RED SOX NATIVES AND BOSTON EVENT GUIDE ONCE AGAIN HAVE INVITED ALL DRINKING BUDDIES TO JOIN THEM FOR BOSTON'S BEST ROOF DECK HAPPY HOUR***

Splash is an amazing venue with a plush lounge and one of Boston's best and largest roof deck with cabanas, complimentary hors d'oeuvres and billiards. A perfect place to hang out and enjoy a few drinks on a warm night. If you prefer you're also welcome to sit inside in our reserved section.

Join the Red Sox Natives and other groups for a Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge from 5 pm to 9 pm on Thursday July 1. This is one of Boston's newest hotspots with 4 hours of complimentary food buffet.

Cocktails start at $12 wine at $10 and beer at $5.
Check out the Splash Drink Menu

Admission is FREE for those who RSVP at this link Splash Happy Hour Registration

You must follow the registration instructions so you're added to the guest list.

Invite friends, co-workers and family....just remember to mention the registration policy to them.

Splash Dress Code is dress to impress, no sneakers, no t-shirts no hats.

When checking in, ask the hostess for the Red Sox Natives Meetup reserved section.

All guests must be at least 21 with proper identification.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Chinatown (orange line) and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are less than a ten (10) minute walk away.

There is very limited metered street parking available in the area.

Valet parking is $20.00.

YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

www.bostoneventguide.com

www.splash-boston.com

www.redsoxnatives.com
item.name: Rush Hour at Splash Sponsored by Boston Event Guide and Red Sox Natives
